No matter it is a couple or a couple, if one party's behavior towards the other party makes the other party feel uncomfortable, it is serious sexual harassment. As long as you don't feel uncomfortable, such as holding hands and hugging normally, it is not sexual harassment. Is it difficult to understand? , itâ€™s based on making another person feel uncomfortable... If you feel uncomfortable and donâ€™t change your behavior even after being warned, isnâ€™t that sexual harassment? Thatâ€™s how itâ€™s defined. This kind of thing is a very personal feeling and cannot be quantified into indicators. Should it be quantified into a few touches of breasts and a few kisses on the mouth? Most of his career was supported by women.

Whether I am considerate or not, my girlfriend knows best. I did what I should do, and she did what she should do. In my opinion, she is a girl who talks about women's rights and really puts women's rights into practice. I admit that Dr. Wang is independent, has a high income, and has a high degree of education, etc., but her wrong remarks are hindering the women's equal rights movement. If there was true equality, there should not be so many utilitarian behaviors in this Weibo. There are a lot of inequalities in the world, and it is only right to fight against them. Feeling sorry for yourself, like Mrs. Xianglin, will not help anything. What's more, Dr. Wang is now instigating things that are harmful to marriage. Where is equality and resistance? , You should be considerate, and the equality I am talking about is only theoretical. In fact, men should also bear more in life. But no one can take this kind of voluntary behavior and being forced to take it for granted, right? Dr. Wang's remarks are really extreme and I cannot agree with them. , fight, only by fighting can we fight for our legitimate rights and interests! If you donâ€™t speak out and resist, no one will promote the progress of the legal system. , now not only girls are afraid of marriage, but also the male friends around me. In order to protect their own interests, girls' extreme remarks on Weibo have labeled women as materialistic, leading some boys to believe that girls value profits and neglect loyalty, and dislike the poor and love the rich. I think it is Dr. Wangâ€™s remarks like this that hinder womenâ€™s equal rights. , these are sexisms, and this is where we have to fight! !
